RSA Level 7
===========

We get only the values of n, e and ciphertext (and the hint: FactorDB is your friend).

The answer to this challenge is to factorize n to get the values of p and q. With the web
[FactorDB](factordb.com) we get the following values:

>p = 3133337
>
>q = 

We are able to get the factorization of n only because the value of p is low enough.

Now, with p, q, n and e, we can apply the same method as in the level 6.

>Decrypyed message: Only 4 more challenges to go!
